article:
'Tyrosine-protein kinase CSK' also known as 'C-Src kinase' or 'cellular Src' or
'C-terminal Src kinase' is an enzyme that in humans is encoded by the CSK
gene. This enzyme phosphorylates tyrosine residues
located in the C-terminal end of Src-family kinases (SFKs) including SRC, HCK,
FYN, LCK, LYN and YES1.
